title: Subspace sum, span, lattice join, lattice supremum

blocks.name: df-shs
blocks.content: Define subspace sum in ` SH ` . See ~ shsval , ~ shsval2i , and ~ shsval3i for its value. (Contributed by NM, 16-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-span
blocks.content: Define the linear span of a subset of Hilbert space. Definition of span in [Schechter] p. 276. See ~ spanval for its value. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-chj
blocks.content: Define Hilbert lattice join. See ~ chjval for its value and ~ chjcl for its closure law. Note that we define it over all Hilbert space subsets to allow proving more general theorems. Even for general subsets the join belongs to ` CH ` ; see ~ sshjcl . (Contributed by NM, 1-Nov-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-chsup
blocks.content: Define the supremum of a set of Hilbert lattice elements. See ~ chsupval2 for its value. We actually define the supremum for an arbitrary collection of Hilbert space subsets, not just elements of the Hilbert lattice ` CH ` , to allow more general theorems. Even for general subsets the supremum still a Hilbert lattice element; see ~ hsupcl . (Contributed by NM, 9-Dec-2003.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: shsval
blocks.content: Value of subspace sum of two Hilbert space subspaces. Definition of subspace sum in [Kalmbach] p. 65. (Contributed by NM, 16-Oct-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm shsval(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), cima(cva, cxp(c0, c1))))
} = {
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, csh, c1, csh, cph, cima(cva, cxp(c0, c1)), cima(cva, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  imaeq2d(cva, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c0, c1), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  xpeq12(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1), c1)
  df-shs(hs0, hs1)
  ax-mp(wcel(cima(cva, cxp(c0, c1)), universe), wcel(cva, cablo))
  hilablo()
  imaexg(cva, cablo, cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csh)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cima(cva, cxp(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(csh)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cima(cva, cxp(c0, c1)))
}

thm shsval(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà SH ‚àß c1 ‚àà SH)‚Üí(c0[+H]c1)=(+h "(c0 √ó c1)))
} = {
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, csh, c1, csh, cph, (+h "(c0 √ó c1)), (+h "(hs0 √ó hs1)))
  imaeq2d(cva, (hs0 √ó hs1), (c0 √ó c1), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1))
  xpeq12(hs0, c0, hs1, c1)
  df-shs(hs0, hs1)
  ax-mp((+h "(c0 √ó c1))‚àà ùïå, +h ‚àà AbelOp)
  hilablo()
  imaexg(cva, cablo, (c0 √ó c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csh)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((+h "(c0 √ó c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(csh)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((+h "(c0 √ó c1)))
}

blocks.name: shsss
blocks.content: The subspace sum is a subset of Hilbert space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: shsel
blocks.content: Membership in the subspace sum of two Hilbert subspaces. (Contributed by NM, 14-Dec-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jan-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm shsel(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cph, c1)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wcel(c2, co(c0, cph, c1)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1))))), wcel(c2, cima(cva, cxp(c0, c1))))
  eleq2d(c2, co(c0, cph, c1), cima(cva, cxp(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)))
  shsval(c0, c1)
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wb(wcel(c2, cima(cva, cxp(c0, c1))), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1)))))), wfn(cva, cxp(chba, chba)), wss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(chba, chba)))
  ax-mp(wfn(cva, cxp(chba, chba)), wf(cva, cxp(chba, chba), chba))
  ax-hfvadd()
  ffn(cva, cxp(chba, chba), chba)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(chba, chba)), wss(c0, chba), wss(c1, chba))
  shss(c0)
  shss(c1)
  xpss12(c0, chba, c1, chba)
  ovelimab(s0, s1, cva, cxp(chba, chba), c0, c1, c2)
  diff.cva.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, chba, chba)
  diff.chba.s(s0)
  diff.cva.s(s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, chba, chba)
  diff.chba.s(s1)
}

thm shsel(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà SH ‚àß c1 ‚àà SH)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(c0[+H]c1)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, c2 =(s0[+h]s1)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ‚àà SH ‚àß c1 ‚àà SH), c2 ‚àà(c0[+H]c1), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, c2 =(s0[+h]s1))), c2 ‚àà(+h "(c0 √ó c1)))
  eleq2d(c2, (c0[+H]c1), (+h "(c0 √ó c1)), (c0 ‚àà SH ‚àß c1 ‚àà SH))
  shsval(c0, c1)
  sylancr((c0 ‚àà SH ‚àß c1 ‚àà SH), (c2 ‚àà(+h "(c0 √ó c1))‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, c2 =(s0[+h]s1)))), +h[Fn](~H √ó ~H), (c0 √ó c1)‚äÜ(~H √ó ~H))
  ax-mp(+h[Fn](~H √ó ~H), (+h :(~H √ó ~H)‚Üí ~H))
  ax-hfvadd()
  ffn(cva, (~H √ó ~H), chba)
  syl2an(c0 ‚àà SH, c1 ‚àà SH, (c0 √ó c1)‚äÜ(~H √ó ~H), c0 ‚äÜ ~H, c1 ‚äÜ ~H)
  shss(c0)
  shss(c1)
  xpss12(c0, chba, c1, chba)
  ovelimab(s0, s1, cva, (~H √ó ~H), c0, c1, c2)
  diff.cva.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, chba, chba)
  diff.chba.s(s0)
  diff.cva.s(s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, chba, chba)
  diff.chba.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: shsel3
blocks.content: Membership in the subspace sum of two Hilbert subspaces, using vector subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 20-Jan-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm shsel3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cph, c1)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cmv, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wcel(c2, co(c0, cph, c1)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cmv, cv(s1))))), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(hs0))))))
  shsel(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  rexbidva(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(hs0)))), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cmv, cv(s1)))))
  impbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(hs0)))), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cmv, cv(s1)))))
  rexlimdva2(hs0, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(hs0))), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cmv, cv(s1)))))
  syldan(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(hs0))), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cmv, cv(s1)))), wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cmv, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)))))
  sylan9eqr(c2, co(cv(s0), cmv, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0))), co(cv(s0), cva, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(hs0))))
  id(wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(hs0))))
  anassrs(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), cva, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s0), cmv, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)))))
  an4s(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), cva, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s0), cmv, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)))))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(c1, csh), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cva, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s0), cmv, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(s0), chba), wcel(cv(hs0), chba))
  shel(c1, cv(hs0))
  hvaddsubval(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  sylan(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cmv, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)))), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cmv, cv(s1)))), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)), c1))
  adantlr(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)), c1))
  adantll(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)), c1))
  mp3an2(wcel(c1, csh), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  shmulcl(c1, cneg(nat1), cv(hs0))
  rspceeqv(s1, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)), c1, c2, co(cv(s0), cmv, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0))), co(cv(s0), cmv, cv(s1)))
  oveq2(cv(s1), co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), cmv)
  rexlimdva2(s1, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cmv, cv(s1))), wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(hs0)))))
  syldan(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cmv, cv(s1))), wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(hs0)))), wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(s1)))))
  sylan9eqr(c2, co(cv(s0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), cmv, cv(s1)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cmv, cv(s1))))
  id(wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cmv, cv(s1))))
  anassrs(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmv, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(s1)))))
  an4s(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmv, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(s1)))))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(c1, csh), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmv, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), chba), wcel(cv(s1), chba))
  shel(c0, cv(s0))
  shel(c1, cv(s1))
  hvsubval(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  sylan(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(s1)))), wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(hs0)))), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(s1)), c1))
  adantlr(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(s1)), c1))
  adantll(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(s1)), c1))
  mp3an2(wcel(c1, csh), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(s1)), c1), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  neg1cn()
  shmulcl(c1, cneg(nat1), cv(s1))
  rspceeqv(hs0, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(s1)), c1, c2, co(cv(s0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), cva, cv(hs0)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(s1)), cv(s0), cva)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, csh)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, csh)
  diff.csh.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s1, c1, wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cmv, cv(s1)))))
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), cmv, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)))
  diff.cmv.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0))
  diff.cneg.s(s1, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.csm.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, csh)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c1, csh)
  diff.csh.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.wrex.s(s1, hs0, c1, wceq(c2, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(hs0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c2, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(hs0)))
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), cva, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cva.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(s1)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(cv(s0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(s1))))
}

thm shsel3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà SH ‚àß c1 ‚àà SH)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(c0[+H]c1)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, c2 =(s0[-h]s1)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ‚àà SH ‚àß c1 ‚àà SH), c2 ‚àà(c0[+H]c1), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, c2 =(s0[-h]s1))), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, c2 =(s0[+h]hs0))))

  rexlimdva2(hs0, c1, ((c0 ‚àà SH ‚àß c1 ‚àà SH)‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), c2 =(s0[+h]hs0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, c2 =(s0[-h]s1)))

  shel(c1, hs0)
  hvaddsubval(s0, hs0)
  sylan((((c0 ‚àà SH ‚àß c1 ‚àà SH)‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), c2 =(s0[-h](-u(1)[.h]hs0)), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, c2 =(s0[-h]s1)), (-u(1)[.h]hs0)‚àà c1)

blocks.name: shseli
blocks.content: Membership in subspace sum. (Contributed by NM, 4-May-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm shseli(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cph, c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1))))))
  -| wcel(c1, csh)
  -| wcel(c2, csh)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  mp2an(wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cph, c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1)))))), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, csh))
  shsel(s0, s1, c1, c2, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm shseli(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1[+H]c2)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, c0 =(s0[+h]s1))))
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà SH
  ‚ä£ c2 ‚àà SH
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  mp2an((c0 ‚àà(c1[+H]c2)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, c0 =(s0[+h]s1)))), c1 ‚àà SH, c2 ‚àà SH)
  shsel(s0, s1, c1, c2, c0)
}

For later convenience we prove a general version that works for any subset of Hilbert space, not just the elements of the lattice ` CH ` . (Contributed by NM, 2-Mar-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  fveq2d(cort, cfv(cort, cuni(cpr(c0, c1))), cfv(cort, cun(c0, c1)), wa(wss(c0, chba), wss(c1, chba)))
  fveq2d(cort, cuni(cpr(c0, c1)), cun(c0, c1), wa(wss(c0, chba), wss(c1, chba)))
  syl2anbr(wss(c0, chba), wss(c1, chba), wceq(cuni(cpr(c0, c1)), cun(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, cpw(chba)), wcel(c1, cpw(chba)))
  uniprg(c0, cpw(chba), c1, cpw(chba))
  syl(wa(wss(c0, chba), wss(c1, chba)), wceq(cfv(chsup, cpr(c0, c1)), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, cuni(cpr(c0, c1))))), wss(cpr(c0, c1), cpw(chba)))

  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, csh)), wss(c0, c1), wi(wrex(hs1, c0, wrex(hs2, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cva, cv(hs2))))), wrex(hs1, c1, wrex(hs2, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cva, cv(hs2)))))))
  ssrexv(hs1, c0, c1, wrex(hs2, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cva, cv(hs2)))))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, csh)), wss(c0, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cph, c2)), wrex(hs1, c0, wrex(hs2, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cva, cv(hs2)))))), wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c2, csh))

blocks.name: shmodi
blocks.content: The modular law is implied by the closure of subspace sum. Part of proof of Theorem 16.9 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 70. (Contributed by NM, 23-Nov-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm shmodi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wss(cin(co(c0, chj, c1), c2), co(c0, chj, cin(c1, c2))))
  -| wcel(c0, csh)
  -| wcel(c1, csh)
  -| wcel(c2, csh)
} = {
  syl6ss(cin(co(c0, chj, c1), c2), co(c0, chj, cin(c1, c2)), co(c0, cph, cin(c1, c2)), wa(wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), wss(c0, c2)))
  imp(wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), wss(c0, c2), wss(cin(co(c0, chj, c1), c2), co(c0, cph, cin(c1, c2))))
  syl5ib(wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), wss(c0, c2), wss(cin(co(c0, chj, c1), c2), co(c0, cph, cin(c1, c2))), wss(cin(co(c0, cph, c1), c2), co(c0, cph, cin(c1, c2))))
  shmodsi(c0, c2, c1)
  sseq1d(cin(co(c0, cph, c1), c2), co(c0, cph, cin(c1, c2)), cin(co(c0, chj, c1), c2), wceq(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)))
  ineq1(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1), c2)
  shsleji(c0, cin(c1, c2))
  shincli(c1, c2)
}
